about_the_game:
Howdy, partners!

For anyone that would want to support project Ananas - Pineapple Idle game, its giveaways in a form of random lotteries, its future updates and creation of more traditional games, Ananas - Pineapple Supporter Edition is available!

Ananas is not going to turn its back on players like some of similar game developers may have done. We're here to give fees back to players, to show that games can be more than just a "fee taker".

If you decide to become Supporter, you're going to get Supporter perks, of course!

  • Once Item-merging is up, Supporters will have better item conversion rate

  • In-game bonuses more capabilities and more!

Thanks for sticking with us, no matter if you're f2p player or Supporter. Cheers!

And for anyone reading this, there's also a code "dlc" to multiple your Collection Power by 10 for anyone to redeem!

name: Ananas - Pineapple Supporter Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
